Class Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    The Card class holds the information about a card object.

        public String toString()

        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card other)
        compareTo method is used to compare two card objects based on their rank.
        Returns:
        A number based on the comparisions of the cards. If it is 1, this card object is higher. If it is -1, the other card object is higher. If it is 0, they are the same rank.
